page.title: 12GRANGE FARM
page.content: A good part of the area is used for { {arable farming.}The majority of this land is owned and farmed by Mr.T.J.Wells of{Grange Farm.}Mr.Wells bought Grange Farm 3 years ago to extend his family's farm at South Ferriby.Their farm is now one of the largest farms in this area and is run by Mr.Wells and his brother.The farm extends to a total of 650 acres of which 210 are at the Grange.The{crops} grown at Grange Farm include potatoes which are the main crop,sugar beet, peas,oilseed rape and winter wheat.The {livestock}on the farm is limited to about 14 cows grazing on land unsuitable for crops.Around the farm building roam chickens,peacocks,a pony for the children to ride and an alsatian as a guard dog. The farm has a lot of farm machinery which is often loaned to other farms.
